Game: Mario & Luigi- Partners in Time 2005-11-28T00:00:00-08:00 The famous Mario Brothers return in this sequel to the humorous Superstar Saga. In this adventure, Princess Peach takes a trip in a time machine, but when it returns, there's only a monster inside! The heroic brothers travel back in time only to discover that evil alien life forms known as the Shroobs have taken over the Mushroom Kingdom, and no-one is safe! They soon meet up with their younger selves, and set out to stop the alien menace, not to mention rescue the Princess! 1 fjyBV7t_EAQ http://images.launchbox-app.com/8d4b52b6-2772-4aae-ace4-3decf1556112.png <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/e5b6e495-8a0f-4113-92fc-7e6cf55438f9.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/a4f7a9be-1352-43f1-925e-2e48e4103664.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/b0c3cfa3-9650-46fd-9e92-f0f58ca5e127.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/23705e35-1e87-49d7-893a-0c5c498b355e.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/5d1bc784-161c-44d3-a195-63f951e37485.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/92c81a9d-dede-499e-be31-17a4ebe1f048.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/89d9ae84-92ff-4296-879a-9a0cefa13e8d.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/b4eb3a2b-97eb-46ef-a251-572f50e14381.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/9e19708c-5227-49e3-b87a-f8fae31e5236.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/e432d718-b45e-49ba-9ba0-b788fc587a32.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/b8d63316-6d47-4b70-a170-42a6927f3aa0.JPG 4.3125 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mario_%26_Luigi:_Partners_in_Time E - Everyone Role-Playing AlphaDream Nintendo
